original_text: And her neighbors and relatives heard that the Lord had shown great mercy to her, and they rejoiced with her.
korean_text: 이웃과 친족이 주께서 그를 크게 긍휼히 여기심을 듣고 함께 즐거워하더라

sentences.original_text: And her neighbors and relatives heard
that the Lord had shown great mercy to her
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 그녀에게 큰 긍휼을 베푸셨다는 것을
